El sueño de este pequeño productor es heredar una finca productiva y sostenible a sus hijos, y está seguro que el café es un rubro rentable para esta y próximas generaciones.
texts.en:
Isidro is a small producer in a rural community of Jinotega. He has worked in coffee growing for more than 8 years. His farm is 28 hectares, of which 8.4 are coffee. His average annual production in the last three years has been 250 quintales of pergamino coffee, which manages the certification criteria of fair trade, UTZ and C.A.F.E. Practices. 

This year he needs funding to buy the supplies and fertilizers that assure the nutrition and maintenance of his coffee plantation, in order to be able to guarantee a good harvest for a greater income to cover his family's necessities. 

The dream of this small producer is that his children inherit a productive and sustainable farm, and he is sure that coffee is a profitable item for this and following generations.

loans.use: to buy agriculture supplies that assure the nutrition of his coffee plantation and a good harvest.

loans.name: Celaque 2 Group

texts.es: Doña María, tiene 50 años de edad, es soltera por viudez, tiene dos hijos y reside en una aldea del municipio de Gracias, Lempira. Ella lleva mas de 20 años de dedicarse a la agricultura con la siembra de granos básicos y luego comenzó con el cultivo de café, el cual es su fuente de ingresos para su familia. Esta producción la vende en pergamino húmedo y seco. ha solicitado otro préstamo siendo este el tercer ciclo en la institución y es por 7,000 Lempiras que los utilizará para pago de empleados para limpieza y para comprar abonos y fertilizantes para aplicarle a la finca de café y obtener mejor cosecha. Su sueño es que sus hijos puedan tener también su propio cultivo. Este préstamo es en forma grupal y el grupo se llama Celaque 2, formado por 3 miembros que se dedican a la agricultura y viven en la misma zona. El préstamo que solicitan es por 19,000 Lempiras para fertilizar su finca. En la foto esta María Brígida a la izquierda, Ana y María Elvia a la derecha.
texts.en: Maria, 50 years old, is single due to widowhood. She has two children and lives in a suburb of the town of Gracias, Lempira. She has dedicated herself to farming for more than 20 years planting basic grains and then she began with the coffee crop, which is the source of income for her family. She sells this production in wet and dry parchment. She has requested another loan, being the third with the institution, for 7000 lempiras which she will use to pay laborers to clean and to buy chemical and organic fertilizers to apply to the coffee farm to obtain a better harvest. Her dream is that her children can also have their own crops. This loan is in group form and the group is named Celaque 2 made up of three members who are dedicated to farming and live in the same area. The loan that they are requesting is for 19,000 lempiras to fertilize their farm. In the photo, Maria Brigida is on the left, Ana and Maria Elvia on the right.

loans.use: to buy organic and chemical fertilizers to apply to the coffee farm.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy cereals.

loans.name: Rivera Del Río Group

texts.es:
Rivera del Río es un grupo formado por nueve habitantes dentro de una comunidad oaxaqueña que aún conserva rasgos de la cultura mazateca como la lengua y las festividades. Los integrantes son: Nicolasa y Rebeca quienes venden comida; Jovita, tejidos; María, ropa para dama, sábanas y colchas; Israel, refrescos; Celia, dulces, botanas y refrescos. Por su parte, Qurino maneja una carpintería; Mauro, una vulcanizadora y una herrería y Pablo, una sastrería.

   Don Quirino está casado con Doña Carmela, es padre de cuatro hijos y es carpintero. Lo que ha llevado a Quiri, como le llaman de carino, a dedicar 27 años de su vida a su oficio es el ejemplo de su padre: "Es el legado de la familia, mi padre era carpintero y con las ganancias solventaba los gastos del hogar". Y al igual que su padre, don Quiri ha podido dar educación a sus hijos y estabilidad a la familia entera, su ilusión es que alguno de sus hijos continúe con el legado familiar.

   Con el paso del tiempo, Quiri ha podido invertir en herramientas para su taller, siempre con el objetivo de brindar la mejor calidad y el mejor precio a sus clientes. El préstamo que solicita es de suma importancia ya que pretende comprar madera antes de que suba el precio puesto que la temporada que se acerca, con los cambios de clima logran que el material se eche a perder y debido a la escasez, el precio aumenta mucho más.
 
   El grupo entero agradece por el apoyo brindado y por la oportunidad de los préstamos que son una fuente de motivación importante en sus vidas. 

  *En la fotografía Don Quirino viste camisa y se ubica detrás de Doña María quien viste blusa color rosa.
texts.en:
Rivera del Rio is a group of nine people from a community in the state of Oaxaca, where the characteristics of the mazatecan culture, like language and festivities, are still preserved. The members are: Nicolasa and Rebeca who sell food; Jovita, textiles; Maria, women's clothing and bed sheets, Israel, soft drinks; Celia, candy, snacks and soft drinks. And on the other hand, Quirino, who runs a carpentry; Mauro, a vulcanizing and blacksmith's workshop; and Pablo a tailor's shop.

Quirino is married to Carmela and father of four children. He is a carpenter. What has led Quiri, so his nickname, to dedicate the last 27 years of his life to his trade is his father's example: "It is a family legacy. My father was a carpenter and with his income he used to make a living." And just like his father, Quiri was able to provide his children with education and stability for the whole family. His hope is that some of his children will continue the family legacy.

In the course of time, Quiri was able to invest in tools for his workshop, always with the goal of offering the best quality and the best price for his customers. The loan he is requesting is paramount, because he intends to buy wood before the prices will rise. Given that a time is coming, where climate changes will cause the material to get scarce, and due to the shortage the prices will rise significantly.

The whole group thanks for the support and the opportunity of these loans, because they are an important source of motivation in their lives. 

(In the photo, Quirino is wearing a shirt and stands behind Maria, who wears a pink blouse.)

loans.use: to buy wood.

loans.name: René Del Carmen

texts.es:
René de 53 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, está casado y es padre de 3 hijos, dos de ellos trabajan fuera de casa, y el tercero de 16 años aún está estudiando bachillerato.

René se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 20 años, toda su familia se dedicaba a dicho trabajo, su esposa le ayuda con los oficios del hogar y sus hijos mayores también aportan al hogar.

Este crédito lo necesita para comprar abonos, herbicidas, pesticidas, etc. entre otros insumos que necesita para la siembra.

Su sueño es seguir trabajando en la agricultura y mejorar a través de los créditos.
texts.en:
René, 53 years old, didn't have the opportunity to go to school. He is married and is the father of 3 children, two of whom work away from the home, and the third is 16 years old and is still in secondary school.

René has worked in agriculture for 20 years. His whole family works in this field, his wife helps him with the household tasks, and his older children also support the household. 

This loan is needed to purchase manure, herbicide, pesticide, etc., and other supplies that he needs for his crop.

His dream is to continue working in agriculture and improve through the loans.

loans.use: to purchase manure, herbicide, pesticide, etc. and other supplies that he needs for his crop.

loans.name: Segundo

texts.es:
Segundo tiene 42 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, vive con su cónyuge y sus 3 hijos en el distrito de Pomahuaca, un distrito mediano cuyas actividades principales son el comercio y la agricultura que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Jaén, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú.

El se dedica a la agricultura, cuenta con una finca de arroz, esta actividad la viene realizando hace más de 10 años por lo que cuenta con experiencia en este negocio y con buenas referencias en su distrito. Adicionalmente se dedica a brindar servicios como peón agrícola. El destino del crédito será para la compra de abonos y fertilizantes para brindar mantenimiento a su cultivo y así lograr una mejor producción, de esta manera el espera poder obtener mayores ingresos para que mejore su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Segundo is 42 years old, in a common-law marriage, lives with his spouse and their 3 children in Pomahuaca district, a medium-size district whose primary activities are commerce and agriculture, and which is located in Jaén province, Cajamarca region, in the northern mountains of Peru. 

He works in agriculture and has a rice farm. He has been doing this work for more than 10 years, for which he has experience in this business and good references in his district. In addition, he works offering his services as an agricultural laborer. The loan will be destined for purchase of manure and fertilizer to maintain his crop and, so, have a better production. In this way, he hopes to be able to have more income so that he can improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to purchase manure and fertilizer to maintain his crop.

loans.name: Meri Orayda

texts.es:
Meri tiene 38 años de edad es casada tiene 3 hijos y vive en Guaranda, en la Parroquia Salinas provincia de Bolivar, pertenece a la ventanilla rural Asoreicom.
Meri se dedica a la agricultura siembra maiz y trigo, cria pollos y ganado, solicita el crédito para la compra de una vaca pequeña, gracias a este crédito podra incrementar su capital de trabajo , las compras lo hace en Guaranda cada semana , su sueño es darles una buena educación a sus hijos, en su tiempo libre le gusta dedicarse a su familia.
texts.en: Meri is 38 years old, married, has 3 children and lives in Guaranda, in Salinas parish, Bolivar province, which is part of the rural service center Asoreicom. Meri works in agriculture; she grows corn and wheat, raises chickens and cattle, and asks for the loan to purchase a small cow. Thanks to this loan, she will be able to increase her working capital. She makes her purchases in Guaranda each week. Her dream is to provide a good education to her children. In her free time, she likes to focus on her family.

loans.use: to purchase a small cow.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy ingredients for her restaurant.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy clothing.

loans.name: Eddy

texts.es:
Eddy es un hombre de 39 años de edad, soltero, sin hijos, y su negocio es la venta de choripán.
Él es emprendedor, comprensivo, paciente, optimista, de buena actitud, amable, responsable y muy trabajador. Su negocio lo desarrolla de forma ambulante en ferias y fiestas de la ciudad, caracterizada por estar construida sobre asentamientos tiwanakotas, collas e incaicos. De clima variable entre -5 a 18 grados centígrados.
Eddy es de tez morena, cabello gris lo usa muy corto, ojos obscuros usa lentes de aumento, baja estatura, complexión física robusta, su lengua materna es el Aymará que habla en familia y habla español por cultura general y por el negocio que realiza. Su vida la comparte con sus familiares que trabajan, viven en una casa propia construida de ladrillo y cemento que cuenta con agua potable, energía eléctrica, gas domiciliario y alcantarillado. Su negocio es la venta de choripán; que es una comida que consiste en un chorizo parrillero asado, servido al centro de un pan, típica de la gastronomía lugareña. Su forma de preparación generalmente es con pan ‘Marraqueta’ y chorizo asado a la parrilla. El chorizo es del tipo parrillero, típico del área altiplánica se consume fresco y se condimenta con ají, “inicié mi negocio vendiendo desde a puerta de mi casa, luego me movilicé hacia ferias y fiestas para mejorar mis ingresos…” comenta. La ventaja de su negocio es la facilidad de preparación y popularidad del alimento, la desventaja es la falta de muebles para la mejora del negocio. Su sueño es abrir un negocio de venta de choripán en auto, él desea ampliar su negocio mediante la compra de carpas, sillas y banquetas para la venta de choripán. Esta es la 1 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 5 años que desarrolla esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que Eddy solicita un préstamo para la compra de carpas, sillas y banquetas para vender choripán en ferias y fiestas.
texts.en:
Eddy is a 39-year-old man, single, with no children, and his business is selling choripán [a chorizo sandwich].

He is enterprising, understanding, patient, optimistic, has a good attitude, is friendly, responsible, and very hard-working. His business is done as a vendor at fairs and festivals in the city. The city is characterized by being built on Tiwanakota, Colla and Inca settlements, with a variable climate between -5 and 18 degrees centigrade.

Eddy has dark skin, gray hair that he keeps cut short, dark eyes, wears glasses, is short, has a robust physique, his native language is Aymará, which he speaks with his family, and he speaks Spanish due to the general culture and the business he does. He shares his life with his family members who work, and live in their own house built of brick and cement which has drinking water, electricity, gas service, and sewer service. His business is selling choripán, which is a dish that is made up of barbequed chorizo, served in the middle of bread, which is a typical cuisine of the area. He generally prepares it with "marraqueta" bread and barbequed chorizo. The chorizo is of the barbequed type, typical of the high plains which is eaten fresh and is flavored with hot peppers. "I began my business selling from the door of my house, later I moved to the fairs and festivals to improve my income..." he says. The advantage of his business is the ease of preparation and the popularity of the dish. The disadvantage is the lack for furniture to improve the business. His dream is to open a business selling choripán from a vehicle. He wants to expand his business through the purchase of awnings, chairs and benches for the choripán sales. This is his first loan sequence in the 5 years he has been doing this work. 

For these reasons, Eddy asks for a loan to purchase awnings, chairs and benches to sell choripán at fairs and festivals.

loans.use: to purchase awnings, chairs and benches to sell choripán [a chorizo sandwich] at fairs and festivals.

loans.name: René Noe

texts.es:
René tiene 48 años de edad, estudió hasta 5° grado, ahora está casado y es padre de 4 hijos, dos varones los cuales viven aparte y son independientes y dos hembras que aún viven con ellos y estudian en l escuela y que por lo tanto dependen de él. 

Rene trabaja como fontanero en el proyecto de agua potable que está en su comunidad, desde hace 10 años se dedica a este oficio, también trabaja en agricultura en una parcela que está a unos minutos de su casa, mientras que su esposa le ayuda con los oficios del hogar.

Rene invertirá el dinero para comprar fertilizantes para sus cultivos y pagará mano de obra.

Él desea obtener un crédito más grande y así poder mejorar su vivienda y brindarle a su familia todo lo necesario.
texts.en:
René is 48 years old, went to school up to the 5th grade, now is married, and is the father of 4 children, two boys who now live on their own and are independent and two girls who still live with them and go to school and, so, depend on him. 

René works as a plumber in the drinking water project that is in his community. He has worked in this job for 10 years, and he also works in agriculture in a plot of land that is a few minutes from his house, while his wife helps with the household tasks. 

René will invest the money in purchasing fertilizer for his crops and paying labor costs. 

He wants to get a larger loan and in this way be able to improve his house and offer his family everything it needs.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer for his crops and to pay labor costs.

loans.name: José Santos

texts.es:
José de 71 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, está casado y es padre de 3 hijos, ellos son independientes y viven aparte, en su casa vive solamente con su esposa.

José se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 30 años, este trabajo lo aprendió de su familia, también en época se dedica a la corta de café y el lugar donde trabaja está cerca de su casa.

José invertirá el crédito para comprar abonos, fertilizantes, herbicidas, etc. para la siembra de granos básicos y pagará mano de obra.

Su sueño es conseguir una parcela más grande para aumentar la siembra de granos básicos.
texts.en:
José, 71 years old, didn't have the opportunity to go to school. He is married and the father of 3 children, who are independent and live on their own. In his house, he only lives with his wife.

José has worked in agriculture for the past 30 years. He learned this work from his family. Also, he seasonally works pruning coffee and the place where he works is near his house. 

José will invest the loan to purchase manure, fertilizer, herbicides, etc. for the crop of basic grains and will pay labor costs.

His dream is to get a larger plot of land to expand his crop of basic grains.

loans.use: to purchase manure, fertilizer, herbicides, etc. for the crop of basic grains and to pay labor costs.

loans.name: Mirian Elena

texts.es:
Mirian tiene 28 años de edad es soltera tiene un hijo de 7 años vive en Guaranda en la parroquia Salinas provincia de Bolivar, pertenece  a la ventanilla rural Asoreicom que se dedican a la agricultura manufactura y ganaderia.
Ella solicita el crédita para la compra de ganado ya que desea salir adelante con su hija y gracias a este credito podra comprar su ganado y asi mantenerse ya que es la unica actividad que realiza, las compras realiza en Guaranda cada 15 dias, su sueño es tener un negocio propio para poder pagar los estudios de la hija, los desfios a los que se enfrenta es la falta de medios de transporte, en su tiempo libre le gusta cuidar a sus animales ya que de ellos sobrevive.
texts.en:
Mirian is 28 years old. She is single and has a 7 year old daughter. She lives in Guaranda in the Salinas parish of the Bolivar province. She belongs to the Asoreicom solidarity group who work in agriculture, manufacture and livestock. 

She is asking for the loan to buy cattle because she wants to get ahead with her daughter. Thanks to this loan she will be able to buy her cattle and support herself since it is the only work that she does. She makes her purchases in Guaranda every 15 days. 

Her dream is to have her own business to be able to pay her daughter's schooling. The challenge that she faces is the lack of means of transportation. In her free time she likes to take care of her animals since she survives off of them.

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy makeup and tools for her salon.

loans.name: Sreytoch

texts.en:
Sreytoch is a 21-year-old married grocer who lives in the Kandal Province of Cambodia. Her husband is 25, and has been as a factory worker since 2010. Both of them  earn approximately $12 per day. 

Sreytoch would like to buy lumber to renovate her house.  In the future, she is going to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy lumber to renovate her house.

loans.name: Ataa

texts.en:
Ataa is 21 years old. She lives in a sector of Jordan called Salt. Ataa is studying to earn a  Bachelor’s degree in education and she is in her first year. 

After she will graduates, Ataa is planning to find a better job, earn a better income, and support herself. She hasn't been able to pay for her upcoming semester fees and  has therefore applied for this loan.

loans.use: to pay for her upcoming semester.

loans.name: Estefany Rosanna

texts.es:
Estefany Rossana es una joven estudiante de Odontologia, ella solicita un pretamo para poder cubrir sus gastos educativo, esta es su historia: Mi nombre es Estefay Rosanna, tengo 19 años y nací en la ciudad de Cotui me crie en un campo de Cotui llamado Fantino bajo la tutela de mi abuela y unos tíos. Curse mis estudios primarios y secundarios en aquel lugar y desde que estaba en segundo del bachillerato supe que quería hacerme profesional en el área de la salud.
Estoy estudiando Odontología  en la Universidad de Ucateci,   pese a que vivía con mi abuela de escasos recursos se me hizo un poco difícil ingresar de inmediato a la universidad, pero gracias a la ayuda de mi hermana y su esposo con los que actualmente vivo en la ciudad de La Vega pude ingresar. 
Actualmente ya estoy en la necesidad de acudir a ustedes ya que mientras más avanzo más costoso se hace todo y mi hermana tiene muchos compromisos por lo cual no puede cubrirme la carrera, por otro lado no puedo trabajar pues se hace muy difícil conseguir un empleo que sea flexible a los horarios de clase y no quiero por nada pararme de estudiar ya que es un sueño y meta para mí y quiero poder ayudar a mis hermanas que en un tiempo no muy lejano ingresaran a la universidad. 
Confiando en su solidaridad y ayuda me despido, al mismo tiempo que deseo que Dios prospere su empresa y dejándole un cordial saludo.
texts.en:
Estefany Rossana is a young dental student. She is asking for a loan to cover her educational expenses.  Here is her story: My name is Estefany Rosanna, I am 19 years old and was born in the city of Cotui. I grew up in a rural part of Cotui called Fantino in the care of my grandmother and some uncles. I completed my primary and secondary education in that place and since I was in the second year of secondary school, I knew that I wanted to become a professional in the health field. 

I am a dental student at the University of Uateci. Due to living with my grandmother who had limited resources, it made it a bit difficult to enter university immediately, however thanks to the help of my sister and her husband, who currently live in the city of La Vega, I could enter.

Now, I need to approach you since as I advance, everything becomes more expensive and my sister has many commitments so she can't pay for my degree. On the other hand, I can't work because it is very difficult to get a job that is flexible with the class schedule and I don't want to stop studying for anything since it is a dream and a goal for me and I want to be able to help my sisters who will enter university in a not-too-distant future. 

I am counting on your support and help and I will close and at the same time I wish God makes your business prosper and leave you with warm regards.

loans.use: to cover higher education expenses.

loans.name: José Saturnino

texts.es:
José de 62 años de edad,  estudió solo primer grado, está casado y su esposa se dedica  a los oficios domésticos y a vender frutas y verduras, tiene 4 hijos los cuales están casados y viven aparte pues ya son personas independientes, por lo tanto solo su esposa depende de José


José se dedica a cultivar hortalizas como tomates, chiles, pepinos y granos básicos como maíz y frijol, realiza esta actividad desde hace ya  30 años, aprendió este trabajo gracias a un programa que cursó sobre cultivos de hortalizas y que fue impartido por una  de agricultura, su esposa es quien le ayuda en el trabajo y en ocasiones sus hijos.


Él solicita este crédito para comprar una malla de nailon con el objetivo de proteger sus cultivos de las plagas, también comprará 3 rollos de hilo, y pagará mano de obra, gracias al financiamiento podrá mejorar sus cultivos y obtendrá buenas ganancias.

Él sueña en grande, pues le gustaría comercializar sus cultivos en otras regiones y tener un negocio fuerte.
texts.en:
José, 62 years old, only went to school for the first grade. He is married and his wife takes care of the domestic tasks and sells fruits and vegetables. He has 4 children who are married and live on their own since they are independent people. So, only his wife depends on José.

José works growing vegetables such as tomatoes, chiles, cucumbers and basic grains such as corn and beans. He has done this work now for 30 years, he learned this work thanks to a program which he attended about vegetable crops which was taught by someone from agriculture. His wife is the one who helps him in his work, and sometimes his children as well.

He asks for this loan to purchase nylon mesh with the goal of protecting his crops from pests, and also will purchase 3 rolls of wire, and will pay labor costs. Thanks to the financing, he will be able to improve his crops and will get good earnings.

He dreams big, since he would like to sell his crops in other regions and have a strong business.

loans.use: to purchase nylon mesh with the goal of protecting his crop from pests, and also he will purchase 3 rolls of wire and will pay labor costs.

loans.name: Leonor

texts.es:
Leonor, de 37 años de edad, solo estudio hasta segundo grado, se acompañó hace 20 años y su pareja trabaja como motorista en un pick up transportando personas desde un caserío, hasta la parada de buses, tiene 3 hijos, su hijo mayor trabaja como jornal agrícola y los dos menores van a la escuela.

Leonor, trabaja desde hace un año y medio como empleada en un cafetín escolar, antes solo hacia los oficios de su hogar, fue su vecina quien le dio la oportunidad de trabajar con ella en el cafetín, la escuela está cerca de su casa, todos los días que hay clases entra a trabajar a las 5:00 a.m. y regresa a su casa a las 4.30 p.m. 

Con el préstamo ella alquilará un terreno para sembrar maíz y frijoles con su familia, con esto tendrá granos para el consumo de la familia todo el año.

Sus sueños a futuro son, ver crecer a sus hijos y que se gradúen de una carrera universitaria.
texts.en:
Leonor, 37 years old, only went to school up to second grade. He has been partnered for 20 years and her partner works as a driver in a pickup, bringing people from a village to the bus stop. They have 3 children. Her oldest son works as an agricultural day laborer and the two younger ones to go school. 

Leonor has worked for a year and a half as an employee at a school canteen. Before, she only did the household chores. It was her neighbor who gave her the opportunity to work with her in the canteen. The school is near her house and every day that there are classes, she goes to work at 5:00 am and returns to her house at 4:30. 

With the loan, she will rent a plot of land to plant corn and beans with her family. With this, she will have food for family consumption for the whole year.

Her dreams for the future are to see her children grow and that they graduate with a university degree.

loans.use: to rent land to plant corn and beans.

loans.name: Jose Cayetano

texts.es:
José de 35 años de edad, estudió hasta tercer grado en la escuela, debido a que sus padres  no tenían los suficientes recursos económicos no pudo estudiar más, está acompañado, su esposa es comerciante y junto a ella ha procreado un hijo.


José se dedica a vender cd’s de películas y productos de primera necesidad en su casa, tiene ya 6 años de dedicarse a este oficio pues es una actividad que le genera buenos ingresos económicos, este trabajo lo consiguió gracias a una propuesta de un amigo del negocio, además es motorista ya que anteriormente manejaba camiones y así adquirió experiencia.

Él solicita este crédito para comprar 2 docenas de pantalones para mujeres, 2 docenas para hombres, 2 docenas de blusas para damas y 1 docena de camisas para caballeros y también ropa para niños, todo esto con el fin de tener muy surtido su negocio.

Él sueña grandemente con ampliar su tienda y de alguna manera emplear personas en su trabajo, también desea remodelar su casa pues la tiene un poco deteriorada.
texts.en:
José, 35 years old, went to school up to the third grade, because his parents didn't have sufficient economic resources and he couldn't study more. He is partnered. His wife is in sales and with her he has a son. 

José works selling CDs of movies, and basic household products. He has been working in this job for 6 years since it is work that generates good income for him. He got this work thanks to a proposal from a friend in the business. In addition, he is a driver since before he drove trucks and in this way he got experience. 

He asks for this loan to purchase 2 dozen women's pants, 2 dozen for men, 2 dozen women's blouses and 1 dozen men's shirts and also clothing for children. All this is with the end of having his business very well stocked. 

He dreams big of expanding his store an din some way employing people in his work. He also wants to remodel his house since it is a bit deteriorated.

loans.use: to purchase 2 dozen women's pants, 2 dozen for men, 2 dozen women's blouses and 1 dozen men's shirts and also clothing for children.

loans.name: Los Horcones 1 Group

texts.es: Don Rogelio, tiene 58 años de edad, esta casado, y vive junto a su esposa y un  nieto en una aldea de Gracias, Lempira. Siempre se ha dedicado al cultivo de maíz y frijol y hace 12 años sembró café. La producción de maíz y café lo vende en la misma zona. Don Rogelio a solicitado 3 prestamos en la institución con el actual que es por 3,500 lempiras para pago de trabajadores en la preparación de la tierra donde siembra maíz y en fertilizantes para sacar mejor cosecha. Su meta es tener una producción mas grande de granos básicos para aumentar las ventas. El préstamo es grupal y es por 10,500 lempiras, el grupo se llama Los Horcones 1, integrado por 3 miembros que se dedican al cultivo de maíz, frijol y café. todos viven en la misma Zona. En la foto esta Sergio, María y Rogelio a la derecha.
texts.en:
Don Rogelio is 58 years old. He is married and lives with his wife and grandson in the village of Gracias, Lempira. He has always made a living growing corn and beans and for 12 years he has grown coffee. He sells the production of corn and coffee in the same area. 

Don Rogelio has asked for 3 loans in the institution including the current one that is for 3,500 lempiras to pay the workers in the preparation of the land where he grows corn, and on fertilizers to get a better harvest. His goal is to have a bigger production of basic grains to increase the sales. The loan is for a group and is for 10,500 lempiras. The group is called Los Horcones 1, integrated by 3 members that make a living growing corn, beans and coffee. They all live in the same area. In the picture is Sergio, María and Rogelio to the right.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and pay labor to prepare the land and grow corn.

loans.name: Agape Group

texts.en:
These people have formed a five-member group called Agape. They live in the same area and sell food, toothpaste, second-hand clothing, general goods and waakye (cooked rice and beans). 

Ruby is a wife and mother who sells waakye and groceries. She asks for 2,800 GHS to buy more rice and beans and groceries. She handles her family's daily expenses and supports her husband to manage their expenses. She has more than 23 years experience in this business and is applying for her sixth loan with ID-Ghana. She works from 7 a.m. until 8 p.m.

The group has received proper orientation about the loan and saving principals and promises to use this loan judiciously. In the future, and with the help of the institution, she would like to expand her business and save money to improve the life of her family.

loans.use: to buy more rice and beans to prepare and sell waakye and to buy groceries to sell.

loans.name: Cecilia

texts.en:
Cecilia, 33, is married and has three children from 12 to 10 years old.

She operates a tricycle (motorcycle with sidecar) transportation service. Aside from that, she engages in a rice retailing business. She has been engaged in these businesses  for 10 years now. 

She is asking for a loan to pay for her motorcycle franchise and the motorcycle registration and repair as well as additional stocks of rice. These tools are essential in augmenting her business. She can now continue to operate her business and her daily income will improve. Thus, she can continue send her children to school and provide them with good food.

Cecilia is determined to manage her business successfully for the welfare of her growing children.

loans.use: to pay for her motorcycle franchise and the motorcycle registration and repair, as well as to buy additional stocks of rice

loans.name: Mirian Rocio

texts.es:
Mirian tiene 22 años de edad es soltera tiene un hijo y vive en Guaranda, parroquia Salinas provincia de Bolivar.
Ella se dedica a la agricultura y a la cria de animales es ayudante de cocina en una tienda de manjares y chocolates, solicita el credito para la compra de insumos agricolas para la siembra de maiz. Las compras realiza en Guaranda cada 8 días, su sueño es tener su propio negocio, los desafios a los que se enfrenta es la falta de medios de transporte, en su tiempo libre le gusta dedicarse a su hijito.
texts.en:
Mirian is 22 years old. She is single and has a son. They live in Guaranda, in a village named Salinas, in the Bolivar province. Mirian works in agriculture and raising animals. She also works as a kitchen assistant for a chocolate and desserts store.

She is requesting a loan to buy agricultural supplies to grow corn. She goes every week to Guaranda to buy supplies. Her dream is to have her own business. The lack of transportation means is a challenge for her. She likes to spend time with her little son during her free time.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies.

loans.name: Lynn

texts.en:
Raising children is not an easy thing for parents. But because of an unconditional love, Lynn, together with her husband Cesar, they both work hard to suffice the family needs. 

Lynn is 47 years old and a resident of Batasan, Quezon City, Philippines. She runs her own piggery now and to further improve her inventory, she is asking for a PHP 40,000 loan. She will be using the said amount for buying additional pigs to raise and other materials needed for improving her business. 

Your helping hands can now be an open door for Lynn. While she dreams of business expansion and having a successful and happier life in the future, your care can be a start for a brighter future ahead of her and her family. 

She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her life and business every week and where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the Word of God she studies. 

*All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to buy additional pigs to raise and other materials needed for improving her business.

loans.name: Rosemary

texts.en:
Rosemary, 54 years old, is married to Jackson and supports a family of six members. She has been in a fruit-selling business for the last eight years, earning a monthly income of KES 5,500. 

She has applied for her first loan of KES 25,000 from Vision Fund Kenya. She plans to increase her stock so as to satisfy her clients and gain more income to improve her family's living standards. 

She plans to use the profits to repay the loan and expand her business. Her hope is to improve her life.

loans.use: To increase her stock so as to satisfy her clients and gain more income to improve her family's living standards.

loans.name: Nawal's Group

texts.en:
Ali is 47 years old and lives in Irbid, and he is a father of two children. 

Ali is working as a taxi driver and also he is working in printing on plastic bags for shops and companies, with help from his wife Nawal, who really wants to help her husband in any way. Ali and Nawal are seeking to provide a good life for their family and to provide a good education to their kids.

Ali and Nawal decided to expand their business and to start taking bids in packaging plastic bags; therefore they applied for a group loan to help them pay for promotion for their business and to buy tools and raw materials to increase their products.

loans.use: to help them pay for promotion for their business and to buy tools and raw materials to increase their products.

loans.name: Angel Maria

texts.es:
María, de 51 años de edad, estudio hasta noveno grado, se acompañó cuando tenía 24 años, pero por problemas personales se separó hace 13 años, tiene 4 hijos, el menor de sus hijos estudia bachillerato, el otro varón trabaja como jornalero agrícola, una de sus hijas trabaja como niñera cerca de su casa y su hija mayor ya se casó.

María, tiene una pequeña tienda en su casa, donde vende algunas golosinas y víveres  de la canasta básica desde hace 7 años, antes trabajaba como empleada doméstica en la ciudad y los fines de semana vende pupusas con su cuñada. 

María, necesita el préstamo para comprar una hielera, sodas y jugos que venderá con las pupusas, ya que sus clientes le piden estos productos.

En el futuro María, espera aumentar el inventario de su tienda y mejorar las instalaciones de la pupuseria y comprar mesas y silla.
texts.en:
María is 51 years old and was in school until 9th grade. She got married at 24, but because of personal problems she got separated 13 years ago. She has 4 children, the youngest of whom is in high school. The other son works as a farm day laborer. One of her daughters works as a nanny near her house and her oldest daughter is married.

María has a small store in her house, where she has sold some candies and basic food supplies for 7 years. Before, she worked as a domestic employee in the city and on the weekends she sold pupusas with her sister-in-law.

María needs the loan to buy a refrigerator, sodas, and juices which she will sell with the pupusas, since her clients ask her for these products. 

In the future, Maria hopes to increase the inventory of her store, improve the facilities of the pupuseria, and buy tables and chairs.

loans.use: to purchase a refrigerator, sodas, and juices which she will sell with the pupusas.

loans.name: Fakhri

texts.en:
Fakhri is studying at a university engineering faculty. After he finished high school, Fakhri was unable to enter a public university because of his little money, therefore he decided to work in addition to his studies so that he could enter one of the private universities and pay for his education.

Lately his family has faced some financial problems; Fakhri had to help them and give them his semester fees due to his sense of responsibility towards his family. Because of that he had to apply for an education loan to be able to pay for the university fees and complete his semester.

loans.use: To pay for the university fees and complete his semester

loans.name: Eloy

texts.es:
Eloy de 65 años de edad, estudió hasta 6° grado, está casado y tiene 3 hijos, dos de ellos ya son independientes y viven aparte, y el tercero de 25 años aún vive en casa ya  que está enfermo y no puede valerse por si mismo.

Eloy se dedica a la sastrería desde hace 20 años, decidió dedicarse a este oficio porque es algo que le gusta mucho y le genera ingresos, además lo puede hacer desde su casa, también en su tiempo libre trabaja la agricultura en una parcela cerca de su casa .

Eloy necesita el crédito para comprar fertilizantes, pagar mano de obra para la siembra de granos básicos y para comprar repuestos a su máquina de sastre.

Sus sueños son que nunca le falte lo necesario y siempre tener los ingresos económicos para llevar una vida tranquila.
texts.en:
Eloy is 65 years old.  He attended school until 6th grade.  He is married and has three children; two of whom are independent and live separately, and the third is 25 years old but still lives at home because he is sick and cannot fend for himself.

Eloy has made a living with a tailoring shop for 20 years.  He decided to dedicate himself to this job because it is something he really likes and it generates income. Plus, he is able to do it from his house.  In his free time he also works as a farmer on a plot of land near his home.  

Eloy needs the loan in order to buy fertilizer, to pay for the labor to plant his basic grains, and to buy spare parts for his sewing machine.

His dreams are to never lack what is necessary and to always have the income to lead a quiet life.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, pay for the labor to plant his basic grains, and to buy spare parts for his sewing machine.

loans.name: Sarim

texts.en:
Sarim is 33 years old, a married factory worker with three children living in the Kampong Speu Province in Cambodia. She has worked in the factory in a nearby province since 2010. Three of her children attend school. Her husbands is a 35-year-old moto taxi driver. Together they can earn approximately $15 per day. 

Sarim’s house is old and she would like to buy construction materials to renovate her house. She doesn’t have enough finances, so she needs a loan. With this loan, she will be able to have a proper house and better living conditions. 

In the future, she is going to save money to build a bathroom with a toilet and support her children to earn higher education.

loans.use: to buy construction materials to renovate her house.

loans.name: Seymur

texts.en:
Seymur is 30 years old and single and he lives with his parents in Fuzuli region, but they are IDP (Internally Displaced Persons) from Fuzuli city over 23 years and now his home is located near the war zone, where there are difficult living conditions. 

Seymur has been raising cows for 5 years. He buys little calves, raising them and then selling them in a local bazaar. 

Today, Seymur wants to buy calves for his farm. For this reason, he needs 1,000 AZN (Azerbaijan new manat) and therefore he has applied to Komak company for a loan. 

He is thankful to the Kiva organization for the help. In the future, he wishes to develop the industry, increase the income, and get married.

loans.use: to buy calves; in the future, he wishes to develop the industry, increase the income, and get married.

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
Ahmad is a 45-year-old married man from Dier El-Balah city. He lives with his wife and one son in a small house. He works as an employee in the public sector where he gets a low income. This income barely covers all the family's needs.
 
Ahmad took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy a solar system for heating water for the family house. This will help him to provide hot water without using electricity.

loans.use: to buy a solar system for heating water for the family house.

loans.name: Hasan

texts.en:
Hasan is a 25-year-old single man from Jabalia city. He lives with his family in a small house. He works as a farmer on the family agricultural land, where he gets a low and unstable income. This income is barely covering all the family's needs.
 
Hasan took a USD  loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy a solar system for heating water for the family house. This will help him to provide hot water without using electricity. 

Hasan appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a solar system for heating water for the family house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: o buy a solar system for heating water for the family house.

loans.name: Naser

texts.en:
Naser is a 39-years-old married man from Jabalia city. He lives with his wife, three sons and two daughters in a small house. He works as a plumber and gets a low and unstable income. This income barely covers all the family needs.
 
Naser took a USD Murabaha loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy a solar system for heating water for the family house without using electricity.

loans.use: to buy a solar system for heating water for the family house.

loans.name: Zayed

texts.en:
Zayed is a 19-year-old single man from Rafah city. He lives with his family in a small house. He works in a carpentry workshop where he gets a low and unstable income. This income is barely cover all the family needs.

Zayed took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy a solar system for heating water for the family house. This will help him to provide hot water without using electricity.

Zayed appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a solar system for heating water for the family house.

loans.name: Adli

texts.en:
Adli is a 45-years-old married man from Gaza city. He lives with his wife in a small house. He works as an employee in the public sector where he gets a low and unstable income. This income is barely cover all the family needs.
 
Adli took a USD  loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy a solar system for heating water for the family house. this will help him to provide hot water without using electricity. 

Adli appears in the photo

loans.use: to buy a solar system for heating water for the family house.

loans.name: Romel

texts.en:
Most of the people scavenge from a literal huge mountain of trash, this is what you can picture from Payatas, the place where Romel lives. And in a place like this, you can probably not imagine how people survive from the stink and dirt; but Romel and her family strive to do so. 

Romel is 34 years old, a father to two kids, and a faithful husband to Clarrisa, a teacher. Romel supports his family through operating a small sari-sari store in the area. Together with his wife's income, they provide for the basic necessities of the family. 

Romel is dreaming to invest a house someday and to expand his business. But he can't do this without enough money to start up. Thus, he is requesting to loan worth PHP 20,000 to purchase larger quantities of grocery items to display and sell in his store. More products will surely have him the opportunity to acquire greater sales and save for his dream house. 

Your helping hands can change Romel's life today. 

** All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to purchase larger quantities of grocery items to display and sell in his store.

loans.name: Lilia

texts.en:
Sometimes, small things mean a lot. Thus, Lilia wants to say her thanks because she was able to buy larger quantities of merchandise products lately through her granted loan worth PHP 20,000. 

To continue her business enterprise, she would like to avail another PHP 20,000. She knows that your generosity will greatly help her to buy more merchandise goods like processed meats, sausages and other similar products. If she buys larger quantity of these, surely, she can have a larger income and profit. An ease for her family's daily expanses and needs. 

There's no other dream she would like to come true but to see her children finish studies and have a better life someday. And she knows that she could only traverse her children in studies if she would work hard enough to provide them with better education. 

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise goods like processed meats, sausages and other similar products.

loans.name: Fawzeya

texts.en:
Fawzeya was born in 1972 and is a married woman with two children. She lives in a sector in Jordan called Rusaifeh. Fawzeya’s husband works for a low income and she has a small home workshop at her house for tailoring. 

Fawzeya has been working for ten years using an old sewing machine. Now that she has more orders for sewing and tailoring clothes, she has found that she needs to upgrade her machine and buy more tools and fabrics. Fawzeya has therefore applied for a loan to buy more sewing materials and expand her work.

loans.use: To upgrade her sewing machine and buy more tools and fabrics.

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is 26 years old. He lives in a sector of Jordan called Irbid. Mohammad was working but he left his job because it effected to his grades in university. He is studying for his Bachelor's, majoring in sports education. He is planning to find better job after his graduation and to earn a better income in order to support his family. 

However, because of the financial crisis his family has been facing, he wasn't able to pay for his upcoming semester fees. For this reason, he applied for this loan.

loans.use: To pay for his upcoming semester fees

loans.name: Jose Angel

texts.es: Don José, tiene 50 años de edad, esta soltero, vive solo en su casa, reside en una aldea del municipio de Gracias Lempira. Siempre se ha dedicado a la agricultura, cultivando maíz y frijol y lleva 20 años de tener cultivo de café también. Ofrece café y maíz a  sus clientes de la zona. Con el fin de recuperar el cultivo de café que fue dañado por la plaga la Roya, ha solicitado 8,000 Lempiras para pago de trabajadores y comprar abonos y fertilizar su cultivo. Su meta es sembrar mas café cada año y mejorar la producción.
texts.en:
José is 50 years old. He is single and lives alone in his house. He resides in a village in the town of Gracias Lempira. He has always made a living in agriculture, growing corn and beans and he has also spent 20 years having a coffee crop. He offers coffee and corn to his clients in the area. 

In order to recover the coffee crop that was damaged by the rust disease, he has asked for 8,000 Lempiras to pay the workers and to buy manure and fertilize his crops. His goal is to plant more coffee every year and improve his production.

loans.use: to pay labor and to buy manure to fertilize the coffee crop.

loans.name: Safira

texts.en:
Safira is the age of 36; she is the mother of three children and living in Lahore, Pakistan. Her husband has been running a general store where he sells rice, sugar, cooking oil, detergent, soap, biscuits, etc. He manages his household necessities from his own store. In addition some of his relatives like to purchase from his general store. He speaks with monotonous tone which is impressive and he easily wins the trust of others. Due to his behavior and tone, he has built up very good relations with his customers. His general store is very famous in the town; that is the reason his business running well. 

Due to good relation his sales have increased a lot but he does not have sufficient stock to cope with the demand. Therefore, Safira requested a loan for her husband so that he can buy more stock of wheat, rice, flour, pulses, soaps, shampoo, detergents, biscuits, etc. 

Safira hopes that her husband will utilize the loan in positive way; this amount will help him to cope with the demands of her family. She thanks to Kiva and field partner BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy more stock of wheat, rice, flour, pulses, soaps, shampoo, detergents, biscuits etc for her husband's general store

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
Ahmad is a 34-year-old married man from Jabalia city. He lives with his wife and two children in a small house. He works as an employee in the public sector where he gets a low income. This income barely covers all the family's needs.
 
Ahmad took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy a solar system for heating water for the family house. This will help him to provide hot water without using electricity.

loans.use: to buy a solar system for heating water for the family house.

loans.name: Grydia

texts.en:
Sometimes, dreams are the only things you can have in life. And just like any other mother, Grydia also dreams. Wanting to see her children graduate from college someday and expand her business, she is doing now her very best to excel at her craft. 

Grydia is 44 years old. She is married to Manolito, a foreman, and they have three kids. Currently, Grydia is busy operating her direct-selling business. She is selling different kinds of products, mostly, personal product sales like soaps, dish-washing liquids, detergents and the like. The profit she gets from the business becomes a great help for their family basically in terms of their daily expenses. 

To further improve the business, she wants to ask for a 13 000 PHP loan which she will use for buying more products to sell. With this, she can surely gain more income and part of what she will gain, she will save for future investments and part will be used for their everyday living.  

You’ll be a great blessing in advance. Thanks for your heartfelt generosity and goodness.

*All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to buy more products to sell like soap, dish-washing liquids, detergents and other similar products

loans.name: Alma

texts.en:
Population grows from time to time. And when numbers grow, the demand in the clothing industry also raises up- a good opportunity for a dress maker like Alma. 

For years now, it has been part of Alma’s life to make clothes for sale. Being skilled and experienced enough in this kind of livelihood, she has indeed earned better and her craft has well-supported her family to help in daily expenditures.

Up to this time, Alma would like to request for a loan worth PHP 20,000 that she will use to suffice her business with enough threads, fabrics, and other materials, to be used for more production of clothes. With this, she can generate more income for sure.

With full hope, she is aspiring that someday they will be able to have their own house and that her business will soon experience full blast. By now, she is working very hard with impassable passion that in no time all her hopes will get real. She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her life and business every week and where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the Word of God she studies.

*All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for fabric, cloth, thread, needles, and other materials needed in her dress-making business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To prepare a second beauty salon at her home.

loans.name: Fadi

texts.en:
Fadi is a 35-years-old married man from Dier El-Balah city. He lives with his wife and two sons in a small house. He works as a taxi driver where he gets a low and unstable income. This income is barely cover all the family needs. 

Fadi took a USD  loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy a solar system for heating water for the family house. This will help him to provide hot water without using electricity. 

Fadi appears in the photo

loans.use: to buy a solar system for heating water for the family house.

loans.name: Zeyad

texts.en:
Zeyad is a 45-year-old married man from Rafah city. He lives with his wife and three kids in a small house. He works as an employee in the public sector where he gets a low and unstable income. This income is barely cover all the family needs.

Zeyad took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy a solar system for heating water for the family house. This will help him to provide hot water without using electricity.

Zeyad appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a solar system for heating water for the family house.

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is a 30-years-old married man from Rafah city.  He lives with his wife in a small house. He works as an employee in the public sector where he gets a low and unstable income. This income is barely cover all the family needs. 

Mohammad took a USD  loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy a solar system for heating water for the family house. This will help him to provide hot water without using electricity. 

Mohammad appears in the photo

loans.use: to buy a solar system for heating water for the family house.

loans.name: Shazia

texts.en:
SHAZIA is 34 years old, a married woman and mother of two children. Her husband is a driver by profession and provides transportation services using his three-wheeled rickshaw. He has been driving a rickshaw for many years to meet the family's expenses, but now it requires proper maintenance to keep it in its functional routine. 

For this reason, SHAZIA has applied for a loan from Kiva’s field partner BRAC Pakistan for her husband. He wants to buy new tires and do a little bit of engine maintenance on his vehicle. This will help him drive more smoothly and provide a better transport service to his passengers. She is hopeful that this loan will be a productive one for her husband and will bring positive changes to his business.

SHAZIA gives thanks to Kiva and to its field partner BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: a loan helps SHAZIA's husband in repairing his rickshaw.

loans.name: Bushra

texts.en:
Bushra is 32 years old and the mother of four children. 

Her husband owns a small firm in which he operates a few compression molding machines. He takes orders for manufacturing plastic accessories; he employs laborers to work the molding machines on daily wages. For the manufacturing of different plastic accessories, he needs different categories and qualities of raw materials. This time he has taken a huge contract but does not have enough cash in hand to buy raw materials to continue his manufacturing. 

Therefore, Bushra has requested a loan from Kiva’s field partner BRAC Pakistan, so that her husband will be able to buy plastic raw materials for manufacturing plastic accessories. She is very happy after taking this loan and says thank you to Kiva’s field partner BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy raw materials for manufacturing plastic accessories

loans.name: Moamen

texts.en:
Moamen is 21 years old, a single man, living in Irbid,  He is a third year student in university, majoring in Mechanical Engineering.

He is the older sibling for his five brothers, so he is from a big family. His father is the only breadwinner to the family, therefore his parents face financial problems that lead Moamen to apply for an educational loan, to help him cover his semester fees, 

Moamen`s future plan is to find good work, so he can help his brothers to complete their education, and to be a successful man in his field.

loans.use: To cover his third year semester fees in Mechanical Engineering.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to increase her stock.

loans.name: Yaser

texts.en:
Yaser is a 37-years-old married man from Dier El-Balah city. He lives with his wife and two sons in a small house. He works in selling books in his own book store where he gets a low and unstable income. This income is barely cover all the family needs.
 
Yaser took a USD Murabaha loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy a solar system for heating water for the family house. this will help him to provide hot water without using electricity. 

Yaser appears in the photo

loans.use: to buy a solar system for heating water for the family house.
